name: EXCAL - 004 (Evilmon)
description:
EXCAL is a unique EVILMON. EXCAL has been summoned during the great Scout tragedy by fusing 6 EVIL Coins into ??????'s weapon, to achieve a quick victory over the legion of ??????.
The tanto knife quickly became a sentient being and allowed the Scouts to better understand the world of EVIL and what's behind the window.

After being awakened by ??????, EXCAL grew to become 100 times its size and was used by himself as his personal weapon.
It allowed ?????? to destroy the moon.

EXCAL now rests on top of the corporation's building. EXCAL is constantly being watched over by at least 2 helicopters. Every day, there is a risk that ?????? comes back and takes his sword to generate chaos on Earth.

EXCAL cannot be destroyed or altered and is being studied as a conductive material.

EXCAL has been airsummoned to every wallet that owns H=N Mask.1 and the last 10 editions were sold.

EXCAL is a level IV EVILMON.
EXCAL can evolve.
